TopicTitle: "Object has a non uniform scale"? (Blender Errors)

Articles.Content:
I am getting this error message when I click the "Unwrap" Button when generating a UV MAP. Can anyone help?[TABLE=class: cke\_editor, width: 1854]

Have you tried applying the scale of the object? Its under the menu: Object -> Apply -> Scale, or Control-a is the default short cut to the Apply sub menu.
Yes, that fixed the error... but It still wont generate a UV Map

Make sure in edit mode you have all the vertexes selected, the easiest way is to toggle any you have selected off by hitting the key 'a' then with nothing selected hit 'a' again, all the vertexes then should be selected you can then use unwrap.
Just got that error myself. It happened when I selected uv unwrap instead of the smart UV unwrap I normally do. Did not get it when I cleared the error and selected the smart unwrap.
